Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at 69th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near 35th/Archer.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near 35th/Archer.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
